results.title: Diabetes, Metformin and the Clinical Course of Covid-19: Outcomes, Mechanisms and Suggestions on the Therapeutic Use of Metformin
results.text_hl: Studies on the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on outcomes in people infected with @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@Covid-19@@@ were identified by searching PubMed using the following search string: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ AND (@DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@covid@@@ [ti] OR @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@covid-19@@@ [ti] OR @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@covid19@@@ [ti] OR @<m>DISEASE_Coronavirus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018352 @@@coronavirus@@@ [ti] OR @DISEASE_Severe_Acute_Respiratory_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D045169 @@@SARS-Cov2@@@ [ti]), and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ AND (@DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@covid@@@ OR @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@covid-19@@@ OR @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@covid19@@@ OR @<m>DISEASE_Coronavirus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018352 @@@coronavirus@@@ [ti] OR @DISEASE_Severe_Acute_Respiratory_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D045169 @@@SARS-Cov2@@@ [ti]); the second search was limited to "Clinical Study, Clinical Trial, Controlled Clinical Trial, Meta-Analysis, Observational Study, Randomized Controlled Trial, and Systematic Review" to exclude general reviews and limit the number of search hits.

citations.NLM: Bailey CJ, Gwilt M. Diabetes, Metformin and the Clinical Course of Covid-19: Outcomes, Mechanisms and Suggestions on the Therapeutic Use of Metformin Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():784459. PMID: 35370738
citations.BibTeX: @article{35370738, title={Diabetes, Metformin and the Clinical Course of Covid-19: Outcomes, Mechanisms and Suggestions on the Therapeutic Use of Metformin}, author={Bailey CJ and Gwilt M}, journal={Front Pharmacol}, volume={13}, pages={784459}}

results.title: The Fatty Acid Lipid Metabolism Nexus in COVID-19
results.text_hl: In vitro findings and clinical data reveal that the @GENE_FASN @GENE_2194 @@@FASN@@@ inhibitor, @CHEMICAL_Orlistat @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077403 @@@orlistat@@@, and the @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@ activator, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, may inhibit @<m>DISEASE_Coronavirus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018352 @@@coronavirus@@@ replication and reduce @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@systemic inflammation@@@ to restore immune homeostasis.

citations.NLM: Tanner JE, Alfieri C. The Fatty Acid Lipid Metabolism Nexus in COVID-19 Viruses. 2021 Jan 11;13(1):. PMID: 33440724
citations.BibTeX: @article{33440724, title={The Fatty Acid Lipid Metabolism Nexus in COVID-19}, author={Tanner JE and Alfieri C}, journal={Viruses}, volume={13}, number={1}}

results.title: Multifaceted Mechanisms of Action of Metformin Which Have Been Unraveled One after Another in the Long History
results.text_hl: ...10. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Consumption Potentially Influences the Mortality in Subjects with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Coronavirus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018352 @@@Coronavirus Infectious Disease@@@ (@DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@)

results.title: Perspectives of Antidiabetic Drugs in Diabetes With Coronavirus Infections
results.text_hl: Emerging evidence found that treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Coronavirus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018352 @@@coronavirus infection@@@ is not harmful and could possibly be beneficial.

citations.NLM: Sun B, Huang S, Zhou J. Perspectives of Antidiabetic Drugs in Diabetes With Coronavirus Infections Front Pharmacol. 2020;11():592439. PMID: 33584268
citations.BibTeX: @article{33584268, title={Perspectives of Antidiabetic Drugs in Diabetes With Coronavirus Infections}, author={Sun B and Huang S and Zhou J}, journal={Front Pharmacol}, volume={11}, pages={592439}}

results.title: Metformin: new applications for an old drug.
results.text_hl: Regarding @DISEASE_Communicable_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D003141 @@@infectious diseases@@@, @DISEASE_Tuberculosis @DISEASE_MESH:D014376 @@@tuberculosis@@@ (@DISEASE_Tuberculosis @DISEASE_MESH:D014376 @@@TB@@@) and @<m>DISEASE_Coronavirus_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018352 @@@coronavirus disease@@@ (@DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@) are among the conditions suggested to be affected by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
